snippet.title: Clown Meat - Official Overview Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into Clown Meat, learn about the story, tour the ruined world, and see gameplay in this trailer for the upcoming precision platformer game. In Clown Meat, tumble through a butchered world where humanity is barely a memory on your naïve journey to cheer up the monolithic clown that came from the Depths of Jupiter. Clown Meat will be coming to PC in 2024.
